statements: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, name FROM employees WHERE shift_start_time > '08:00:00';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employees WHERE department IN ('HR', 'Finance') ORDER BY shift_start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering' AND shift_start_time < '09:00:00';
SELECT name, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employees WHERE shift_start_time > '12:00:00' ORDER BY department DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE shift_start_time < '12:00:00' AND shift_end_time > '16:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees WHERE shift_start_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '17:00:00';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees ORDER BY employee_position DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE employee_position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM work_assignments WHERE assignment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT assignment_description FROM work_assignments WHERE assignment_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3) ORDER BY employee_position DESC;
SELECT employee_name, assignment_date FROM employees JOIN work_assignments ON employees.employee_id = work_assignments.employee_id WHERE assignment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, COUNT(*) AS total_assignments FROM employees JOIN work_assignments ON employees.employee_id = work_assignments.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name HAVING total_assignments > 2;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT shift_id, start_time, end_time FROM shifts ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, task_description FROM employees e JOIN assignments a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, job_title, department FROM employees WHERE hourly_rate > 20;
SELECT shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM shifts WHERE shift_date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT employee_name, job_title, task_description FROM employees INNER JOIN assignments ON employees.employee_id = assignments.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, job_title, department, hourly_rate FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC, hourly_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT name, position FROM Employees ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT * FROM Shifts WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, position, hourly_rate FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT job_title, description FROM Jobs WHERE job_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT employee_id, name, position, hourly_rate FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager' AND hourly_rate > 20 ORDER BY name ASC

SELECT e.name, s.start_time, s.end_time, j.job_title FROM Employees e INNER JOIN Assignments a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id INNER JOIN Shifts s ON a.shift_id = s.shift_id INNER JOIN Jobs j ON a.job_id = j.job_id WHERE j.job_title LIKE '%Engineer%' AND s.start_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS employee_count, position FROM Employees GROUP BY position ORDER BY employee_count DESC
SELECT * FROM Shifts WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY shift_id ASC
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_capacity > 10;
SELECT employee_name, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employees JOIN assignments ON employees.employee_id = assignments.employee_id JOIN shifts ON assignments.shift_id = shifts.shift_id;
SELECT warehouse_location, warehouse_capacity FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_capacity < 100
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, employee_shift FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_capacity > 50 ORDER BY shift_start_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, shift_start_time FROM employees JOIN assignments ON employees.employee_id = assignments.employee_id JOIN shifts ON assignments.shift_id = shifts.shift_id;
SELECT warehouse_location, warehouse_capacity FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_capacity < 100 ORDER BY warehouse_capacity ASC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
